title: Exceptional Growth in Agriculture Sector
description: In 2023, Hungary's agriculture, forestry, and fishing sector experienced a remarkable growth of 68.67%, showcasing its robust development in this area.

title: Top Quality Financial Regulations
description: Hungary achieved a score of 99.44 in the B-READY Financial Services Pillar 1 for 2024, indicating top-tier quality in financial regulations.

title: Strong Regulatory Framework
description: In 2024, Hungary's regulatory framework scored 78.34 in the B-READY Pillar 1, reflecting a strong and effective regulatory environment.

title: Universal Access to Safe Drinking Water in Rural Areas
description: By 2022, 100% of Hungary's rural population had access to safely managed drinking water services, ensuring high standards of public health.

title: Minimal Mineral Rent Contribution to GDP
description: In 2018, mineral rents contributed a negligible 0.00003% to Hungary's GDP, indicating limited reliance on mineral resources.

title: High Net Outflow of Foreign Direct Investment
description: In 2023, Hungary experienced a significant net outflow of foreign direct investment, amounting to -34.80% of GDP, highlighting potential capital flight issues.

title: Negative Net Primary Income from Abroad
description: In 2022, Hungary's net primary income from abroad was negative, amounting to -1,184,208,756,000 LCU, indicating a deficit in international income flows.

title: Low Net Official Development Assistance Contribution
description: In 2017, Hungary's net ODA contribution was only 0.11% of GNI, reflecting a minimal role in international aid provision.

title: Moderate Control of Corruption Uncertainty
description: In 2023, Hungary's standard error for control of corruption was 0.145, indicating moderate uncertainty in corruption control measures.
